Description: Pottery ostracon with part of one incised line - Coptic (?), from the rim of a vessel, inside of rim painted with a black band with three white circles.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394077) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394077)
